-- Example is based on AdventureWorks
use nyc_taxi_ldw;


GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.taxi_zone
    WITH (
            LOCATION = 'silver/taxi_zone',
            DATA_SOURCE = nyc_tax_src,
            FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
            ) AS

SELECT *
FROM bronze.taxi_zone2;
GO

Select * from silver.taxi_zone

GO
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.calendar
    WITH (
            LOCATION = 'silver/calendar',
            DATA_SOURCE = nyc_tax_src,
            FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
            ) AS

SELECT *
FROM bronze.calendar;
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.trip_type
    WITH (
            LOCATION = 'silver/trip_type',
            DATA_SOURCE = nyc_tax_src,
            FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
            ) AS

SELECT *
FROM bronze.trip_type;

GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.vendor
    WITH (
            LOCATION = 'silver/vendor',
            DATA_SOURCE = nyc_tax_src,
            FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
            ) AS

SELECT *
FROM bronze.vendor;

GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.rate_code
    WITH (
            LOCATION = 'silver/rate_code',
            DATA_SOURCE = nyc_tax_src,
            FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
            ) AS

Select 
rate_code_id,rate_code
FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK  'raw\rate_code.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_tax_src',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
) 
WITH 
(
    jsonDOC NVARCHAR(MAX)

)
as rate_code
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDOC) WITH (
    rate_code_id TINYINT,
    rate_code VARCHAR(50)
) 


GO


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.payment_type
    WITH (
            LOCATION = 'silver/payment_type',
            DATA_SOURCE = nyc_tax_src,
            FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
            ) AS

SELECT payment_type,payment_type_desc as description
 FROM OPENROWSET(
    BULK  'raw\payment_type.json',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_tax_src',
    FORMAT = 'CSV',
    PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
    FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
    FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
    ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
 )
 WITH 
 (
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
 )
 
  as payment_type
 CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
 WITH (
    payment_type SMALLINT,
    payment_type_desc VARCHAR(20) 
      )
